description: Chihaya appears to be the leader of the Flower Garden Opera Troupe. She arrived in the battle area just after Iris had defeated Maya. She complemented Iris on a truly excellent battle and that she was able to beat their top star Maya. Chihaya offered them the job to go on the stage for the Flower Garden Opera Troupe. Not realizing that Ash and Cilan were guys, the three of them quickly ran out of the building as they didn`t want to be discovered by Chihaya and the other girls.
name: Chihaya-sensei
